actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide for the designation of the 11th day of November of each year as Veterans Day and the 30th of May of each year as Memorial Day.

summary.text: Designates the 11th day of November of each year as Veterans Day and the 30th day of May as Memorial Day and makes such days legal public holidays. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 6103(a))

titles.title: Joint resolution to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide for the designation of the 11th day of November of each year as Veterans Day and the 30th of May of each year as Memorial Day.
